MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the G13 postcode area of Glasgow. It was necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 7:30pm due to an underground cable fault in Crow road and this may be affecting the supply to your property. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the difficult digging conditions and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by Midnight. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:09 PM on Thursday, 14 January 2021
